detail: run(expression, root) expression - Any valid expression
documentation:
This runs the command in the context of the current database.

detail: evaluate(expression, root) expression - Any valid expression
documentation:
This evaluates an expression, running the expression and returning a JSON that contains a list of query parts, and methods for interacting with the query. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/expressions/expressions#evaluate-expression-root)
